channel.title: Cheap BMX
channel.description:
So I want a cheap BMX for this summer just for cruising around town looking all chill init, my mountain bike is just plain embarrassing to ride around -.-
Where would I buy a cheap thing like this, I wouldn't mind building it myself either, actually I'd prefer it, I imagine it's a little cheaper? Doesn't have to be anything special, as long as it works, though I'd probably do some amateur jumping.
Even if it's from ebay or whatever, what would be the cheapest price I'd be looking at?

item.title: Cheap BMX
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:12, topic:402560”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=499618.msg3653981#msg3653981 date=1309904864]
I have a 2011 Norco Katmandu that I got cheap off of a dealer.
[/quote]

That helps.[/quote]
If you read my previous post, I was trying to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheap BMX
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Stupit:

I have a 2011 Norco Katmandu that I got cheap off of a dealer.

item.title: Cheap BMX
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:402560”]Nah they look silly, plus wanna be able to jump around on it etc. :P[/quote]Well look around online for one I guess. A good family friend of ours sold me one for $150 US dollars custom built. I love the bike, but I just don’t ride around with it much because i feel way too big for it xD I can almost knee myself in the upper half of my chest if I ride sitting on it

Read full topic

item.title: Cheap BMX
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:6, topic:402560”][quote author=pot up pls link=topic=499618.msg3653869#msg3653869 date=1309900583]

Haggle with the owners at a local shop. They’ll drop lots of money on the bike you want when your about to walk away.

The local one sells all their’s for like £700+

Why not just buy the bike parts? And like you said, make it your self?
[/quote]
Sure, what do I need, frame, wheels, handlebars, pedals, brake leads?

Just curious- is your mountain bike banged up or something? I ride one and its not really embarrassing ._. and its almost as old as me!

It’s pretty creaky, and just generally a shit make, and it just looks huge on me, just want someonething I can ride casually without looking like a dingbat.[/quote]
Crank and sht. shouldn’t cost too much. xD

Read full topic

item.title: Cheap BMX
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Nah they look silly, plus wanna be able to jump around on it etc.

It’s pretty creaky, and just generally a shit make, and it just looks huge on me, just want someonething I can ride casually without looking like a dingbat.[/quote]Oh well get a Cruiser or something. You got the look for it
